'''Lhara '''is a character who appears in [[Season 4|fourth]] and [[Season 5|fifth]] seasons. She is played by guest star [[Sarine Sofair]] and appears in "[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]".
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no mention of a character named Lhara.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Lhara is a [[prostitute]] living in [[Braavos]].
====[[Season 4]]====
She is at a bathhouse with [[Salladhor Saan]] and [[Bathhouse prostitute|another prostitute]] when [[Davos Seaworth]] interrupts them and recruits Salladhor.<ref>"[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]"</ref>
